title: Toward Enhancing User Experience and Adoption of AI Chatbot Apps for Mental Health: Insights from Natural Language Processing of User Reviews
details: M Ozolcer, Y Yang, S Kate, P Samant, SW Bae - The Proceedings of the 2024 Conference …
abstract: Approximately 75% of people with mental disorders do not seek help due to the stigma associated with it [1]. Self-care and mental health management have seen rapid growth in the domain of mobile health apps (mHealth apps) along with notable …
